name: Challenge Truck Hillroad
description:
Challenge Truck Hillroad is much harder than other vehicle driving on offroad so put your hands on big truck cargo steering and be the professional offroad master driver of the hill climbing roads and offroad. So accept the challenge of big truck cargo driving and become an expert driver of this off-road cargo truck transport Game.
Feature
• 3D Realistic environment with 3D Graphic
• Get Challenge to enjoy base mission
• Realistic driving control of big truck cargo
• 10 plus Exciting and challenging level
• Diesel Truck driving on mountain road with real traffic
